author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2260: Fix AttributeSource to not hold a strong reference to the Attribute/AttributeImpl classes which prevents unloading of custom attributes loaded by other classloaders. The same fix applies to VirtualMethod (3.1 only).

author: rr
msg: ODE-767: New test to make sure the behavior of WSDL11Endpoint is well specified (by Antoine Toulme)

author: bodewig
msg: Add more information to the exception if extra fields can not be parsed.  COMPRESS-75

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2209: add expert IndexWriter.removeUnusedFiles to force IW to retry deletion of files no longer used (only useful on windows)
